basic_information.scholarship_name: Samuel Henry Mitchell and Elizabeth P. Mitchell Scholarship for Mathematics
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Mathematics. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Mathematics major Undergraduate or graduate student 3.0 GPA or above Enrolled in a minimum of 6 hours per semester Two faculty letters of recommendation

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
